tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE warehouse_layout (
    aisle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    aisle_number INT,
    aisle_capacity INT,
    product_id INT,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    product_category VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Product (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    quantity INT,
    warehouse_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (warehouse_id) REFERENCES Warehouse(id)
);

CREATE TABLE product_shelf_mapping (
    product_id INT,
    shelf_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (product_id, shelf_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES product(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (shelf_id) REFERENCES shelf(id)
);

CREATE TABLE warehouse_layout (
    warehouse_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    warehouse_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE product_category (
    category_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    category_name VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE product (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    category_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES product_category(category_id)
)

CREATE TABLE storage_bin (
    bin_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    warehouse_id INT,
    capacity DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (warehouse_id) REFERENCES warehouse_layout(warehouse_id)
)

CREATE TABLE product_storage (
    storage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    bin_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES product(product_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (bin_id) REFERENCES storage_bin(bin_id)
)
